text:
Liam Payne Releases Brand New Single, ‘Bedroom Floor’!

If you thought his first single, ‘Strip That Down’ was sexy, well you’ll absolutely love his second one as Liam Payne has released ‘Bedroom Floor’!

The song was co-written by Charlie Puth and Jacob Kasher – the latter has worked on songs for Nicki Minaj, Selena Gomez and Britney Spears.

Back in June, Liam teased that he and Charlie had worked on a song together…

Mr @charlieputh I have something extra special for you today — Liam (@LiamPayne) June 10, 2017

Don't worry here's a small Warning ?? look there's a little sign just for youwe have made a song and I'm very excited about it ?? — Liam (@LiamPayne) June 10, 2017

Back in May during an interview with BBC Radio 1, Liam revealed that ‘Bedroom Floor’ was actually his girlfriend Cheryl Cole’s favourite song, “We both like that song, and it’s been her favorite from the start.”

He also revealed that prior to the release of his debut single,’ Strip That Down’, there was some thought that ‘Bedroom Floor’ would be the lead single, “Bedroom Floor’ was the single before this [‘Strip That Down’] was the single. Naturally, it could only be the next one.”

‘Bedroom Floor’ comes out the same day as Liam’s One Direction bandmate Niall Horan releases his debut studio album, ‘Flicker’.

Take a listen to Liam’s sexy new single, ‘Bedroom Floor’ and let us know what you think!
